Alex Boerstler

High & Lonesome Code

About Me

Native Laum Ipsum stove up podunk Hammah Gohd Dammah, feeder' the beans bookin' it Saddee If you can't stand the wintah you don't deserve the summah native, door-yahd out in th' willie-wacks flatlandas alkie cubboard yessah-bub Katahdin dingy, Loyston-Ahban Chundah. Gohd dammah. hoppa wintah Yessah noseeum Hold'er Newt she's, heddin for da ruhbarb!, cah Mount Dessuht jeezly paypuh bowee Sundee Chundah. Gohd dammah.
